title: Время «Спартака»
overview: The history of the formation of football "Spartak" - the legendary team that won the champion title and defeated the strongest clubs in Europe in the Champions League. Oleg Romantsev, Vladimir Beschastnykh, Dmitry Alenichev, Egor Titov, Stanislav Cherchesov, Andrei Tikhonov and other club stars recall how the most important victories were achieved and against the background of what events of the 90s they took place.
